title: How Verstappen went from zero to hero at the Hungarian GP
description: Nate Saunders and Laurence Edmondson take a look at another chaotic F1 race, which saw Max Verstappen finish second despite managing to crash before the race and Lewis Hamilton move closer to Michael Schumacher's victory record.
itunes:title: How Verstappen went from zero to hero at the Hungarian GP
itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: A look at another chaotic F1 race, which saw Max Verstappen finish second despite managing to crash before the race and Lewis Hamilton move closer to Michael Schumacher's victory record.
itunes:summary: Nate Saunders and Laurence Edmondson take a look at another chaotic F1 race, which saw Max Verstappen finish second despite managing to crash before the race and Lewis Hamilton move closer to Michael Schumacher's victory record.
